description: 100% new retail  Material: Stainless steel  Quantity : 6 Pcs  Shape: Rectangle  Size: 4cm X 12cm (1.57 inchs X 4.72 inchs )
6 Pcs of Nail Art Stamp Templates

1. Apply base coat or regular polish on the nail. 2. Remove the blue film on plates, apply the nail polish to desired image within a plate. (Recommended: Use the Solid Color Nail Polish, so that the texture will be thicker than other nail polish) 3. Make a scraper leaned over 45 degrees and scrape excessive polish off quickly and strongly from inside to outside. 4. Immediately press the stamper with a gentle rolling motion to pick up the design. The image is transferred on the stamp. 5. Stamp the image on your nail with a gentle rolling motion. The image is transferred on your nail. 6. Repeat the above steps for all of your nails. 7. After stamping nail art, apply top coat for lasting wear.
